name: Embrace of the Abyss
description:
Even the loneliest abyss of infinite darkness is worth to be loved. Like the depths of abyss and the love of the sea, this piece has no start or end, no left or right, it continues indefinitely.

Special release for "Here and Now 3" experience. Here and Now is a groundbreaking 3D experience that is built to immerse the viewer into the work of the artist. It is more than a gallery, it's a statement on how art can be virtually experienced.

Digital art | 8640 x 2160 | JPG
